# cardanoscan-python
Cardanoscan API Service Python SDK

# Installation

```sh
python3 -m pip install cardanoscan-python
```

# Development

Install Dependencies
```sh
python3 -m pip install -e .[tests]
```

Run Tests
```sh
python3 -m pytest
```
or with logs
```sh
python3 -m pytest -s
```
